title: Operation Iron Reboot
notes: Full-body strength and conditioning. Focus on barbell control, posture, and carry capacity.

blocks.name: Strength Circuit - The Big 3 Reloaded
blocks.instructions: 3 rounds for quality. Rest 90 sec between rounds.

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.notes: Math: (185-45)/2=70 lps per side -> 45+25. Brace hard, drive from heels.

exercises.name: Barbell Overhead Press
exercises.notes: Math: (95-45)/2=25 lps per side -> 25. Keep ribs down, punch through.

exercises.name: Weighted Pull-ups
exercises.notes: Full hang. Controlled descent. No kipping.

blocks.name: Posterior and Core Armor
blocks.instructions: 3 sets. Controlled tempo on all movements.

exercises.name: Barbell Romanian Deadlift
exercises.notes: Math: (155-45)/2=55 lbs per side -> 45+10. Stretch hamstrings, soft knees.

blocks.name: Finisher - The Grinder
blocks.instructions: 10 min AMRAP: 10 KB Swings, 10 HR Pushups, 100m Farmer Carry.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.notes: Hinge pattern. Snap hips. Eye-level height.

exercises.name: Hand-Release Pushups
exercises.notes: Full chest contact, release hands, lock out each rep.

exercises.name: Farmer Carry
exercises.notes: Neutral spine. Short, quick steps. Strong grip and posture.
